text: Guria is a region in Georgia. The capital city is Ozurgeti. It is bordered by the eastern end of the Black Sea. ==Divisions== Guria is divided into 3 municipalities: *Ozurgeti Municipality *Lanchkhuti Municipality *Chokhatauri Municipality ==People== * Nodar Dumbadze, writer * Pavle Ingorokva (1893-1990), historian * Eduard Shevardnadze, Georgia's former president * Ekvtime Takaishvili (1862-1952), historian * Noe Zhordania, Prime Minister of the Democratic Republic of Georgia from 1918 to 1921 ==References== ==Other websites== Category:Regions of Georgia (country)
title: Guria
